content: offering an instant pdf crochet pattern to make a the cutest little crochet moose lovey ever this little guy is the perfect quick and easy last minute baby shower gift materials needed yarn bee soft & sleek yarn crochet hook size 7 4 5mm tapestry needle pattern is written in english using standard american terms the pattern and photographs of this design are the property of crochet with gabriella rose this pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not distribute or sell this pattern under any circumstances due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase
